divs: sighting detailsabout 2:00-pm on 7\8\2008 i visited a small private airport near me. while there i decided to take of few pictures of this airport and a few airplanes. my last picture was of flags waveing on top of a mountian on this airport property... when i downloaded the pictures. i noticed something in the upper left hand of this picture of the flags. i did'nt see it when i took the picture. but what is it ?...bird ?...or ufo ?...i don't know... i use my xp pro picture magnifier to enlarge the object. helped some . but what is the obje t in the "flags" picture. i leave it up to you. as far as i am concerned, its a ufo. .. pictures will explain location of this airport.
